title: Colorfull pancakes
instruction: In a large bowl, sift together the flour, baking powder, salt and sugar. Make a well in the center and pour in the milk, egg and melted butter; mix until smooth.
Heat a lightly oiled griddle or frying pan over medium-high heat. Pour or scoop the batter into the griddle, using approximately 1/4 cup for each pancake. Brow on both sides and serve hot.
